name: Bike Offroad Simulator
description:
Everyone step aside, please! He doesn't like when someone bothers him to break a new record. Did you figure out who it is? Ha, it's about you.

The Bike Offroad Simulator is a racing-simulation game that puts you to the test again.

This time, one wrong move and it could cost you,your life. So be very careful, because the motorcycle provided is not one that loves to jump and climb hills, but is one for crazy speeds.

Your mission is to reach the end of each level in a limited time.

Game features :
- Multiple levels
- 3 motorcycles
- Obstacles on the mountain route
- Limited time
